pullRequest.title: Add initial support for net.kyori.text library
pullRequest.bodyText:
PGM relies too heavily on custom Component code and its created a lot of technical debt. Text formatting is a well solved problem and we do not need to reinvent the wheel. The net.kyori.text library is a well supported, platform agnostic library that gives us all the functionality we need.
Since this is a significant part of the codebase, we will try out something we haven't done before, which is a rolling refactor. Both net.kyroi and tc.oc versions of Component will be used until a full refactor is achieved.
This process will also allow us to take a second look at translation strings, which have a haphazard set of standards over the years: legacy.properties will contain all the old strings, and as code is migrated to the new library, it will be put in the en-US.properties file.
We should be able to remove a significant amount of boilerplate Component code and improve our translation strings at the same time. Sometime during the process, I will also setup Crowdin so we can start adding internationalization support.
